title: If the Authority considers that the site is insanitary, incapable of being well drained or is danger
clause_text: If the Authority considers that the site is insanitary, incapable of being well drained or is dangerous to construct a building on it;
section: Site not Eligible for Construction of Building

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
source_pdf.text_snippet: If the Authority considers that the site is insanitary, incapable of being well drained or is dangerous to construct a building on it;
